text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Ronald McDonald talking about fancy refrigerators when you know this idiot has a Viking. Talk about delays, sure wish we had a pandemic response team in November 19 when we learned about COVID-19 from the WHO. Nice try.
